      • isSideSolid

        boolean isSideSolid(BlockPos pos,
                    EnumFacing side,
                    boolean _default)
        FORGE: isSideSolid, pulled up from World
        参数:
        pos - Position
        side - Side
        _default - default return value
        返回:
        if the block is solid on the side
